entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
